title: Number of missing persons files in the U.S. by race 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
The highest Race White has 349321.0 more Number of missing persons than the lowest Race Indian.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of missing persons for 5 number of Races.
The Number of missing persons is highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
The highest Race White has 349321.0 more Number of missing persons than the lowest Race Indian.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of missing persons for 5 number of Races.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
Race Black has the second highest value for Number of missing persons.
The difference of Number of missing persons between the highest and lowest Race is 349321.0.
The Race White has the highest Number of missing persons, followed by Black, and Unknown. Down to the Race Indian which is the lowest.
The Race White tends to be 2.95 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Races, we get total 609275.0.
